title: Groove Adventure Rave (Rave Master)
synopsis: Fifty years ago, malevolent stones known as Dark Brings brought about the "Overdrive," a calamitous event that destroyed one-tenth of the world. In the present day, the nefarious organization Demon Card seeks the Dark Brings' power for their all but innocent intentions.
voices: ['Seki, Tomokazu', 'Suzuki, Akiko', 'Kawasumi, Ayako', 'Morikubo, Shoutarou', 'Shiga, Katsuya', 'Kikuchi, Masami', 'Murozono, Takehiro', 'Yukana', 'Seki, Toshihiko', 'Suzuki, Akiko']
